parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of brake lines can cause brake fluid leaks, leading to a loss of braking power, which can result in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Brake pedal goes to the floor

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the vehicle to lose braking power, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: brake pedal jumps up and down

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Warped or excessively worn brake rotors can cause the vehicle to vibrate when applying brakes, leading to extended stopping distances and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: excessive wear on brake pads and rotors.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of brake calipers can cause the vehicle to lose braking power, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: causing damage to other brake components.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: steering wheel hangs up at a 45-degree point
vehicle wanders from left to right
and hard to turn the wheel back.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ball joints can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: upper and lower ball joints worn out
and worn to the level that very little force was needed to remove the ball from the socket.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the pitman arm can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
The failure of the tie rod can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: vehicle came to a screeching halt
and tie rod end broke while parked.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the idler arm can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: and over 75% of metal at the link was worn and rusted.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cruise control system can cause the vehicle to catch fire, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The cruise control system fails to function
the vehicle is unable to be repaired due to unavailability of parts.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden acceleration can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially if the vehicle is unable to be controlled.
symptoms: the vehicle goes into open throttle position
the vehicle is unable to be stopped.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Delayed Repair of Cruise Control Recall
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delayed repair of the cruise control recall can cause the vehicle to catch fire, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The dealer is unable to repair the vehicle due to unavailability of parts
the vehicle is left in a state of disrepair
the vehicle is unable to be used.
